page.title: 02MIDLAND MEAT PACKERS
page.content: The Midland Meat Packers is an Abattoir which is a local slaughterhouse. It was built in 1975. 480 people work there,27 people from Crick; 10 men,15 women and 2 part-time workers. There are different types of jobs. There are Slaughterers,Boners, Trimmers,Packers,Cleaners, Maintenance Mechanics,Lorry drivers and Office staff and Management. When the cows get there they go to the Slaughter house and are stunned. Then they go to be skinned and gutted.Afterwards they go to be boned, cleaned,trimmed and packed. Then they are distributed. The bones are crushed for meat to make beefburgers. The men have to waer white overalls,white caps and big chained gloves. The meat is distributed in whole pieces and is cut up at its destinaton. The area of the building is 47,000 sq.metres.
